title: When Blaming Trump Is Not Enough
sub_head: New Jersey’s governor needs a new story for the state’s Covid disasters.
body:
Remember last year when the administration of New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy was blaming the politics of the Trump Justice Department for investigating the state’s disastrous mismanagement of nursing homes? Now the Garden State Democrat needs a new excuse.
Susan Livio reports for the Newark Star-Ledger:
